{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Stone Gate|It|Stone Gate}} is the convergence of the roads to [[Dawn Winery]] (northeast), [[Wuwang Hill]] and [[Qingce Village]] (northwest), and [[Dihua Marsh]] and [[Liyue Harbor]] (south).</p><p>There are two [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in its vicinity, one towards the northern end of the area and one towards the west.</p>}}
